sentence: first class venue as usual
It was 200 metres from railway station round the corner from my uncles birthday venue close to shops
Great Venue for Workshops
We came from interstate and found the location and the venue very appealing
It was very conveniently located close to our venue for our church rally so we only had to park the car in the hotel secure parking and then walk
Absolutely perfect for a work conference at the zenith theatre
The location was perfect for my needs as the conference I attended was at the Concourse
Great location next to the railway so easy to go anywhere next to major shopping venues also
Good catering and meeting facilities
Good location but everything except the foyer was old yellowing and cringeworthy
Foyer is small and seemed to very crowded when I arrived but no further issues throughout the stay
I do not stay in hotels much but stayed because I was attending a function there
It was a cold night and each time I had to go to the foyer the doors were open the wind was blistering and I felt sorry for your frozen reception team
Negatives Hotel needs an urgent refurbishment particularly the carpets in the foyer hallways and rooms
Foyer dirty and uninviting
I arrived back from a meeting at 945am and found cleaners already turning over my room even though I had n’t checked out yet
Overall pleasant though being put into a room which had a barely functioning air conditioner especially when I start at the hotel regularly was disappointing

Sitting Australia and logging on with my usual email URL you might expect that the web site would know who and where Iam but no all too often pricing is in US and when ever you try to take advantage of the 1 night free acom you get pushed well outside the locale you want into the lower standard chains that Acor have on the books
Staff were poor maintenance in foyer given wrong room key ironing board broke but too 24 hrs to get it fixed
Check in was friendly though with the loud music plying in the foyer I could not her a word the receptionist said
